title: 11th Cat, Vol. 4
description: After meeting Nomi's brother, Rika leaves Nomi behind with him and returns back home with her uncle. Meanwhile, the secret scheme of the Sword Master of Black Iron is revealed... to revive Arthur, his best friend and Rika's father, at the price of Rika's life!! The final volume of the cutest adventure ever is now here!!
author: Kim Mi-kyung
